channel.title: (508) how do i add/change starter wear?

item.title: (508) how do i add/change starter wear?

item.title: (508) how do i add/change starter wear?
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

if ::starter, search in client.java for “starter” use quotes. change the items you want it to give using the correct id’s

if ur talking about what u have in ur inventory to start off with, seach if(starter in client.java.
change the bunch of additem(####, ####); to whatever ud like it to be.

if it is the stuff you are wearing when you start, soz my server doesnt have that, just option 2.

if none of that works, soz im using 317 atm…

Read full topic
